sentences.en: Archaeological evidence will provide clues about what the building was used for.
sentences.cn: 考古证据将为这幢建筑的用途提供线索。

sentences.en: Diet may hold the clue to the causes of migraine.
sentences.cn: 从饮食之中可能得知偏头疼的一些原因.

sentences.en: Galileo's work on falling bodies supplied the final clue.
sentences.cn: 伽俐略对落体的研究提供了终极答案.

sentences.en: He speaks so indistinctly that many listeners haven't a clue what he is saying.
sentences.cn: 他说话含混不清，以至很多听众一点都不知道他在说什么。

sentences.en: How a man shaves may be a telling clue to his age.
sentences.cn: 男人刮胡子的方式也许能泄露其年龄。

sentences.en: I gave him another clue, but he still didn't twig ( the answer ).
sentences.cn: 我又提示他一次, 他还是不理解 ( 那答案 ).

sentences.en: I hadn't a clue to the meaning of "activism"
I haven't got a clue about the train schedule.
sentences.cn: 我一点都不知道这个列车时刻表.

sentences.en: It was a shocking little clue to the efficiency of the Germans.
sentences.cn: 这件小事足以说明德国方面的工作效率相当惊人.

sentences.en: No clue to the mystery has been found.
sentences.cn: 至今还没发现任何有关这一神秘事物的蛛丝马迹.

sentences.en: Police have found a vital clue .
sentences.cn: 警方发现了至关重要的线索。

sentences.en: That was the clue which clinched it for us.
sentences.cn: 就是那个线索帮我们最终解决了问题。

sentences.en: The clue could not be followed up.
The hair on your head may give a clue to your health.
sentences.cn: 毛发能提供健康状况的线索.

sentences.en: The police followed home the clue and finally caught the culprit.
sentences.cn: 警察根据线索追根到底,终于抓住了这个罪犯.

sentences.en: The policeman's mind refused to accept Soapy even as a clue.
sentences.cn: 警察根本没把索比看成作案对象.

sentences.en: This gave me a clue as to the source of the problem.
sentences.cn: 这件事给我提供了找出问题根源的线索。

trans.tran_en: an object or piece of information that helps someone solve a crime or mystery

trans.tran_cn: 为…提供线索；为…提供情况
